quest.name: Mystery Miners
journal:
 Quest Sync
Drery is faced with a nigh unfathomable conundrum.
objectives: Solve the riddle in the will.
Deliver the dainty wooden chest to Drery.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Should you choose to undertake this quest, you will receive no guidance from the journal or the duty list. You will need to read the text carefully and decipher the clues to determine your next course of action.

dialogue.name: DRERY
dialogue.text: If you've got a moment, let me tell you about a friend of mine. She was a hard worker, but her real passion was for riddles, head-scratchers, and the like. Until she met her end at the hands of a right horrible sin eater. Phronesis, I think they called it.

dialogue.name: DRERY
dialogue.text: Anyway, like a lot of miners, my friend kept a will. But she couldn't write a nice, simple one the same as everyone else, oh no.

dialogue.name: DRERY
dialogue.text: It said that she'd buried something and that if we wanted to find it, we'd have to solve a conundrum. Trouble is, none of us can work it out. But I thought someone like you, with an outsider's perspective, might see something we hadn't.

dialogue.name: DRERY
dialogue.text:
"On road leading afar, follow to the third star,
Fear not the fall, look to the Wall,
At the first dry giant's heel, the brave wanderer must kneel."

dialogue.name: DRERY
dialogue.text: I can't make head nor tail of it, to be honest. Still, we're dying to know what she's buried, so if you have any luck, be sure to tell us. Oh, and I wrote down the riddle, in case you forget.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Use Drery's note to read the riddle again.

dialogue.name: DRERY
dialogue.text:
"On road leading afar, follow to the third star,
Fear not the fall, look to the Wall,
At the first dry giant's heel, the brave wanderer must kneel."

dialogue.name: DRERY
dialogue.text: Not the sort of thing most folk would write as their last will and testament, I'm sure you'll agree.

dialogue.name: MEMO03510
dialogue.text:
"On road leading afar, follow to the third star,
Fear not the fall, look to the Wall,
At the first dry giant's heel, the brave wanderer must kneel."

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: You discover a small chest buried beneath the sand!

dialogue.name: DRERY
dialogue.text: I can't believe you found it!

dialogue.name: DRERY
dialogue.text: Coins, rings, even an expensive-looking pocket knife. This must be what she raked in from all those card games!

dialogue.name: DRERY
dialogue.text: Wait, there's a letter. “This is for Twine,” is all it says.

dialogue.name: DRERY
dialogue.text: Come to think of it, I knew she made a killing on the cards, but I never saw her spending much of her winnings. Seems she was putting them away to give back to the town after her death, almost like she knew it was coming.

dialogue.name: DRERY
dialogue.text: Always was a mystery, that one. It's funny, I never realized how much I miss her until now. Not only have you solved the riddle, but you've shown me what sort of person she really was. You have my thanks.
